content.question: A committee chair in the House of Representatives is always

choices.label: the member with the longest service on the committee
the member with the longest service in the House
a member of the majority party in the chamber
a trusted ally of the President

content.answer: a member of the majority party in the chamber

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
